name: places/ChIJP6aT0xlawokR4bLtjNfpzlY
formattedAddress: 1 Maiden Ln, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1 Maiden Ln, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text:
Fraudulent and rude. Michael Welchko was supposed to provide a service for a name change and new EIN for a business. After spending thousands on his services, he charged me $600~ for two more services and did nothing of it. He is a liar and rude. He said I never asked for it but still charged me. When I asked for an itemized receipt, he sent me a bill for 1 small service of name change that actually cost $60 in the state I was registered. He threatened the situation and said he has all the recordings and that "I need to get my stuff together and call back." When I asked for a refund for the absent service received, he didn't reply for weeks and finally told me he is willing to give $100~ back. Shaky business.

Go to incfile rather than these scammers!

originalText.text: I called to see if I could get some help with a title agent for which I had done a notary service/loan signing.  The agent was ignoring my emails following up on payment for the service.  The attorney who answered the call was very rude right from the start.  The advice he gave me was get paid in advance next time.  I could have figured that out on my own.  I didn't need legal counsel telling me that.  I will for sure not be renewing my membership.  Stay away from Amerilawyer.  I have worked as a legal assistant for many years and I have NEVER encountered such a rude, unprofessional, ill-mannered attorney in my 32-year career in the legal field.  There are better general counsel legal services out there.  I learned the hard way.

originalText.text: Excellent service. It was very easy to form an LLC.

text.text: Excellent service. It was very easy to form an LLC.
